TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XamlCompilationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values that control when XAML is compiled into IL.

remarks.para: Enabling build-time compilation by specifying the Compile option checks the XAML at build time, reduces loading time, and produces a smaller assembly or application.
By default, XAML compilation at build time is turned off.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.Xaml.XamlCompilationOptions Compile = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Compile the XAML for the class or project when the application is built.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.Xaml.XamlCompilationOptions Skip = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Compile the XAML for the class or project when the application is run on the device.
